title: A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus. Venus completes an orbit around the Sun before it completes a rotation on its axis, making its day (243 Earth days) longer than its year (225 Earth days)

Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible. Honey's natural composition makes it incredibly resistant to bacteria and spoilage
A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance
The total weight of ants on earth once equaled the total weight of people
